comments.content:
I was trying to use the [Serif Font ID Guide](http://web.archive.org/web/20090522121650/http:/www.bowfinprintworks.com/SerifGuide/intro.php) on it, but I couldn’t see enough key letters. If you have a more complete sample, perhaps you could try it yourself. It may be tricky deciding which form of certain letters to choose, and in those cases, leave out that choice. More upper case letters would have helped.

- Mike Yanega
That is the Girard slab typeface from House.

Hmmm, I should have noticed the image name...

That’s a new one for the Serif Guide.

- Mike Yanega
